channel.title: Projects on Hima Tammineedi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Hima Tammineedi

item.title: Visual Physical Phone Book
item.description: One reason I prefer FB Messenger (or any other social messaging app like Whatsapp, Telegram, etc.) over texting someone with the default phone texting app is because in Messenger, when I go to message someone, I see their great face looking back at me in their profile picture! If I open my texting app to text or call someone instead, then usually they will just have empty circles because I’m supposed to manually add a picture for them.

item.title: Random Friend Caller
item.description: The mental barrier to calling a friend randomly In the modern world, all your friends, no matter where in the world they are, are just a single phone call or message away. Yet, despite this modern luxury, there can still be quite a mental barrier to actually picking up your phone and calling a friend randomly. You know they’re a good friend who would actually probably enjoy having you call them, but you’re still worried about whether they’ll be busy, and if you’re interrupting something.
